view_seeds.title: My Seeds
view_seeds.search_hint: Currently, seed search only considers the additional name.
view_seeds.fetching_error: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble fetching seeds from my server. Please try again later.
view_seeds.fetching_single_error: Sorry, I could not load the seed from my server. It is possible it doesn't exist.

create_seed.title: Seed Entry
create_seed.changes_model_message: Changes you have made will not be saved. Do you really want to cancel?

create_seed_form.error_price_must_be_number: Sorry, I only understand the price as a number with dot (.) or comma (,) depending on your Browser's preferences as decimal separator, e.g. 2.99
create_seed_form.error_create_seed: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble storing the seed on my server. Please try again later.
create_seed_form.error_seed_already_exists: Sorry, you have already created a seed with this combination of name and plant! Please change the relevant fields and try again.
create_seed_form.error_delete_seed: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble deleting the seed from the server. Please try again later.
create_seed_form.error_fetching_seeds: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble fetching seeds from my server. Please try again later.
create_seed_form.error_fetching_plants: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble fetching plants from my server. Please try again later.
